ssot__PromotionLoyaltyPartnerProduct__dl.name: Promotion Loyalty Partner Product
ssot__PromotionLoyaltyPartnerProduct__dl.description: The Promotion Loyalty Partner Product DMO represents the promotion of a product that a partner is co-marketing to loyalty program members.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__LoyaltyPartnerProductId__c.description: A reference ID to product offered by loyalty program partner that's co-marketed with products marketed to loyalty program members.

ssot__PromotionId__c.description: A reference ID to type of marketing communication used to inform or persuade target audiences of relative merits of product, service, brand, or issue.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Promotion Loyalty Partner Product DMO.
